org.apache.drill.exec.metastore.analyze

Class AnalyzeFileInfoProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.drill.exec.metastore.analyze.AnalyzeFileInfoProvider
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AnalyzeInfoProvider
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AnalyzeParquetInfoProvider

    public abstract class AnalyzeFileInfoProvider
extends Object
implements AnalyzeInfoProvider
    Implementation of AnalyzeInfoProvider for file-based tables.

      SchemaPath getLocationField(ColumnNamesOptions columnNamesOptions)
      Provides schema path to field which will be used as a location for specific table data, for example, for file-based tables, it may be `fqn`.

      • getParentLocationExpression

        public NamedExpression getParentLocationExpression(SchemaPath locationField)
        Description copied from interface: AnalyzeInfoProvider
        Returns expression which may be used to determine parent location for specific table data, i.e. segment location. For example, for file-based tables, such expression will be `parentPath` function call.
        Specified by:
        getParentLocationExpression in interface AnalyzeInfoProvider
        Parameters:
        locationField - location field
        Returns:
        expression to determine parent location
